entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gros Morne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Berry Hill 02:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
